Madison.Chazen Museum of Art:
The Chazen Museum of Art is an art museum located at the University of Wisconsin–Madison in Madison, Wisconsin. The Chazen Museum of Art is accredited by the American Alliance of Museums.


== History ==
Until 2005 the Museum was known as the Elvehjem Museum of Art, named for Conrad Elvehjem, the 13th president of the University and an internationally known biochemist in nutrition.
